definition: the situation of the enemy positions/intelligence about the enemy
enemy/to be a match for/to rival/to resist/to withstand

sentences.english: I left a sergeant in command and rode forward to reconnoitre.
sentences.chinese: 我留下一名中士指挥，自己策马前去侦察敌情。

sentences.english: They began to study and analyze the situation of the enemy.
sentences.chinese: 他们开始研究敌情，分析敌情。

sentences.english: They began to study and analyze the situation of the enemy.
sentences.chinese: 他们开始研究敌情，分析敌情。

sentences.english: The general landed on the scout for his not carefully observing the enemy situation.
sentences.chinese: 将军责骂那个侦察兵没有仔细观察敌情。

sentences.english: Keyboard and others before pass to observe the situation of the enemy, spike ridges defense.
sentences.chinese: 李剑等人在隘口前观察敌情，狼牙岭的防守甚严。

sentences.english: We are quite familiar with the situation of our enemy after long investigation.
sentences.chinese: 经过长时间的侦查，我们已经详悉了敌情。

sentences.english: Only by repeatedly analysing your enemy, then you can find the critical point in their strategy.
sentences.chinese: 反复了解和分析敌情，发现阴谋的重要地方。

sentences.english: The highest level is observation deck in order to understand the enemy.
sentences.chinese: 最高层处设有瞭望台，以便了解敌情。

definition: to pry into/to spy on/to probe into
to investigate/to observe/to scout/to seek out and examine/to explore
intelligence gatherer/spy/detective/scout/sound (medical instrument)/long and narrow probing and sampling utensil
